mapper.insert: MERGE INTO annual_leave al USING dual ON (al.emp_no = #{empNo}) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (emp_no, annual_leave_num, use_num, remaining_leaves) VALUES (#{empNo}, 15, 0, 15)
mapper.select: SELECT lr.* FROM leave_requests lr JOIN documents d ON lr.document_seq = d.document_seq WHERE d.emp_no = #{empNo} AND d.status = '완료'
SELECT e.emp_no, e.name, r.role_title as role_code FROM employee e JOIN role r ON e.role_code = r.role_code WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
select remaining_leaves from annual_leave where emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT emp_no FROM documents WHERE document_seq = #{documentSeq}
